option.name: testKind
option.value: Regular expression

option.name: searchTest
option.value: In single module
decode should split a bitvector value into a sequence of bitvectors
edge should detect edges
falling should detect falling edges
hold should hold a signal
latch should latch a signal
latch should latch a signal when the trigger is asserted
padWords should pad words packed into a bitvector
rising should detect rising edges
rotateLeft should rotate the bits to the left
rotateRight should rotate the bits to the right
sync should generate a sync pulse for rising edges of the target clock
toggle should toggle a bit
should decode sample values
FSM should assert the ready signal during the idle state
FSM should assert the valid signal during the done state
FSM should move to the check state after receiving a request
FSM should move to the done state after applying the pan
FSM should move to the interpolate state when the pipeline has not underflowed
FSM should move to the latch state when the pipeline has underflowed
FSM should move to the level state after interpolating the sample
FSM should move to the pan state after applying the level
pipeline should apply level
pipeline should apply pan
pipeline should decode ADPCM data
pipeline should fetch ADPCM data when the pipeline has underflowed
pipeline should not fetch ADPCM data when the pipeline has not underflowed
pipeline should update linear interpolation index and set underflow flag
FSM should assert the channel state valid signal during the write state
FSM should move to the check state after latch the channel state
FSM should move to the done state after processing all channels
FSM should move to the idle state after setting the audio output
FSM should move to the latch state after reading the channel state
FSM should move to the read state after initializing
FSM should move to the ready state after checking an enabled channel
FSM should move to the write state after checking a disabled channel
FSM should remain in the init state when the channel controller is disabled
PCM data should assert the memory read enable when the pipeline needs PCM data
PCM data should fetch PCM data for the channels
playing should assert the done signal when a channel has reached the end address
playing should not assert the done signal when a channel has reached the loop end address
playing should not assert the done signal when a channel is stopped
playing should sum the channel outputs
should handle min/max sample values
should interpolate sample values
IRQ should assert the IRQ signal for channels that are done
IRQ should not assert the IRQ signal for masked channels
function register should allow writing the channel level
function register should allow writing the channel pitch
function register should allow writing the end address
function register should allow writing the loop end address
function register should allow writing the loop start address
function register should allow writing the start address
status register should allow reading the status of the channels
utility register should allow writing the IRQ mask
utility register should allow writing the enable flags
should increment a dynamic counter
should increment a static counter
should wrap a dynamic counter with zero length
should wrap a static counter with zero length
FSM should move to the cache request state
FSM should move to the cache wait state
FSM should move to the check state
FSM should move to the download state
FSM should move to the graphics request state
FSM should move to the graphics wait state
FSM should return to the idle state after reading a cache line
FSM should return to the idle state after reading graphics data
FSM should return to the idle state after reading the frame buffer from DDR
FSM should return to the idle state after writing the frame buffer to DDR
download should set DDR address and byte mask
download should write DDR data
frame buffer should read the frame buffer from DDR
frame buffer should write the frame buffer to DDR
program ROM should read a cache line from DDR
sound ROM should read a cache line from DDR
tile ROM should read a large tile from DDR
tile ROM should read a small tile from DDR
should assert the write enable signal during a transfer
should not increment the address while the wait signal is asserted
should offset the DDR address when swapping frames
should pad the pixel data
should write frame buffer data to DDR memory
should assert the read enable signal at the start of a transfer
should not start a transfer while the wait signal is asserted
should offset the DDR address when swapping frames
should read frame buffer data from DDR memory
should allow writing masked bytes
should output the registers
